TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileUpload extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 顯示允許使用者選取要上載至伺服器之檔案的文字方塊控制項和瀏覽按鈕。

span.span: Displays a text box control and a browse button that enable users to select a file to upload to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [儲存上傳的檔案Saving Uploaded Files](#saving_uploaded_files) - [安全性考量Security Considerations](#security_considerations) - [記憶體限制Memory Limitations](#memory_limitations) - [將檔案上傳控制項與使用 UpdatePanel 控制項Using the FileUpload Control with the UpdatePanel Control](#using_the_FileUpload_Control_with_the_UpdatePanel_control) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 類別會顯示文字方塊控制項和瀏覽 按鈕可讓使用者選取用戶端上的檔案，並將它上傳至 Web 伺服器。The class displays a text box control and a browse button that enable users to select a file on the client and upload it to the Web server. 使用者指定要輸入本機電腦上的檔案的完整路徑來上傳的檔案 (例如， **C:\MyFiles\TestFile.txt**) 在文字方塊中的控制項。The user specifies the file to upload by entering the full path of the file on the local computer (for example, **C:\MyFiles\TestFile.txt**) in the text box of the control. 或者，使用者可以選取檔案，即可**瀏覽**按鈕，然後再尋找在**選擇檔案** 對話方塊。Alternately, the user can select the file by clicking the **Browse** button, and then locating it in the **Choose File** dialog box. 使用屬性來取得用戶端使用上傳的檔案名稱控制項。Use the property to get the name of a file on a client to upload by using the control. 這個屬性會傳回檔案名稱不包含在用戶端上檔案的路徑。The file name that this property returns does not include the path of the file on the client. 屬性會取得指向要上傳檔案的物件。The property gets a object that points to a file to upload. 使用這個屬性來存取檔案的內容，做為位元組。Use this property to access the contents of the file as bytes. 例如，您可以使用所傳回的物件讀取檔案的內容，做為位元組，並將它們儲存在位元組陣列中的屬性。For example, you can use the object that is returned by the property to read the contents of the file as bytes and store them in a byte array. 或者，您可以使用屬性，以擷取檔案中的所有位元組。Alternatively, you can use the property to retrieve all the bytes in the file. 屬性會取得基礎要上傳之檔案的物件。The property gets the underlying object for the file to upload. 您可以使用這個屬性來存取該檔案上的其他屬性。You can use this property to access additional properties on the file. 屬性會取得檔案長度。The property gets the length of the file. 屬性會取得檔案的 MIME 內容類型。The property gets the MIME content type of the file. 此外，您可以使用屬性來存取屬性，屬性，而方法。In addition, you can use the property to access the property, the property, and the method. 不過，相同的功能由提供屬性，屬性，而方法。However, the same functionality is provided by the property, the property, and the method. ## 儲存上傳的檔案Saving Uploaded Files 控制項不會自動儲存檔案到伺服器之後，使用者選取要上傳檔案。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您也必須明確地提供控制項或機制，讓使用者送出指定的檔案。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，您可以提供使用者按一下 上傳檔案的按鈕。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. 將指定的檔案儲存您撰寫的程式碼應該呼叫方法，在伺服器，將檔案的內容儲存至指定的路徑。The code that you write to save the specified file should call the method, which saves the contents of a file to a specified path on the server. 一般而言，引發回傳至伺服器的事件的事件處理方法中呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called in an event-handling method for an event that raises a post back to the server. 比方說，如果您提供的按鈕送出檔案時，您可以包含要儲存檔案，按一下事件的事件處理方法內的程式碼。For example, if you provide a button to submit a file, you could include the code to save the file inside the event-handling method for the click event. 然後再呼叫方法，以將檔案儲存至伺服器，使用屬性可讓您確認控制項包含的檔案。Before calling the method to save the file to the server, use the property to verify that the control contains a file. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫方法。If the returns `true`, call the method. 如果它傳回`false`，顯示一則訊息給使用者，表示控制項不包含檔案。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 不會檢查屬性來判斷是否要上傳的檔案存在，因為根據預設，這個屬性包含 0 個位元組。Do not check the property to determine whether a file to upload exists because, by default, this property contains 0 bytes. 如此一來，即使控制項是空白的屬性會傳回非 null 值。As a result, even when the control is blank, the property returns a non-null value. ## 安全性考量Security Considerations 當您呼叫方法，您必須指定要儲存上載的檔案目錄的完整路徑。When you call the method, you must specify the full path of the directory in which to save the uploaded file. 如果您未在應用程式程式碼中明確指定路徑，使用者嘗試上傳的檔案時，會擲回例外狀況。If you do not explicitly specify a path in your application code, an exception is thrown when a user attempts to upload a file. 這個行為有助於保護檔案伺服器上的安全，防止使用者從寫入至任意位置，在您的應用程式目錄結構中，以及防止敏感根目錄存取。This behavior helps keep the files on the server secure by preventing users from being able to write to arbitrary locations in your application's directory structure, as well as preventing access to sensitive root directories. 方法會將上傳的檔案寫入指定的目錄。The method writes the uploaded file to the specified directory. 因此，ASP.NET 應用程式必須在伺服器上有目錄的寫入權限。Therefore, the ASP.NET application must have write access to the directory on the server. 有兩種方式，應用程式可以取得寫入權限。There are two ways that the application can get write access. 您可以明確授與寫入存取權的應用程式執行上, 傳的檔案會儲存在目錄中的帳戶。You can explicitly grant write access to the account under which the application is running, in the directory in which the uploaded files will be saved. 或者，您可以增加的被授與 ASP.NET 應用程式的信任層級。Alternatively, you can increase the level of trust that is granted to the ASP.NET application. 若要取得應用程式的執行目錄的寫入權限，必須授與應用程式信任層級設定為物件值。To get write access to the executing directory for the application, the application must be granted the object with the trust level set to the value. 增加的信任層級會增加伺服器上的資源的應用程式的存取。Increasing the level of trust increases the application's access to resources on the server. 請注意這不是安全的作法，因為惡意使用者取得您的應用程式的控制項，也可以在這個較高的信任層級下執行。Note that this is not a secure approach, because a malicious user who gains control of your application will also be able to run under this higher level of trust. 它是具有所需的應用程式執行的最小權限的使用者內容中執行 ASP.NET 應用程式的最佳作法。It is a best practice to run an ASP.NET application in the context of a user with the minimum privileges that are required for the application to run. 如需在 ASP.NET 應用程式安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)和[ASP.NET 信任層級和原則檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information about security in ASP.NET applications, see [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad) and [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). ## 記憶體限制Memory Limitations 一種方式來保護對抗阻絕服務攻擊是可以使用上傳的檔案大小限制控制項。One way to guard against denial of service attacks is to limit the size of the files that can be uploaded by using the control. 您應該設定適用於您要上傳的檔案類型的大小限制。You should set a size limit that is appropriate for the types of files that you expect to be uploaded. 預設大小限制為 4096 kb 4 百萬位元組 (MB)。The default size limit is 4096 kilobytes (KB), or 4 megabytes (MB). 您可以允許更大的檔案上傳設定`maxRequestLength`項目的屬性。You can allow larger files to be uploaded by setting the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the element. 若要增加允許的最大檔案大小為整個應用程式，設定`maxRequestLength`Web.config 檔案中的屬性。To increase the maximum allowable file size for the entire application, set the `maxRequestLength` attribute in the Web.config file. 若要增加允許的檔案大小上限指定的頁面，設定`maxRequestLength`屬性內`location`Web.config 中的項目。如需範例，請參閱[位置元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5)。To increase the maximum allowable file size for a specified page, set the `maxRequestLength` attribute inside the `location` element in Web.config. For an example, see [location Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5). 當上傳大型檔案時，使用者可能也會收到下列錯誤訊息：When uploading large files, a user might also receive the following error message: `aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM).` 如果您的使用者會遇到這個錯誤訊息，增加的值`memoryLimit`屬性中的項目 Web.config 檔，以取得應用程式。If your users encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the of element the Web.config file for the application. `memoryLimit`屬性指定的背景工作處理序可以使用的記憶體數量上限。The `memoryLimit` attribute specifies the maximum amount of memory that a worker process can use. 如果工作者處理序超過`memoryLimit`數量，來取代它，建立新的處理序，以及所有目前的要求重新指派至新的處理序。If the worker process exceeds the `memoryLimit` amount, a new process is created to replace it, and all current requests are reassigned to the new process. 若要控制是否要上傳檔案會暫時儲存在記憶體中或在伺服器上處理要求時，設定`requestLengthDiskThreshold`項目的屬性。To control whether the file to upload is temporarily stored in memory or on the server while the request is being processed, set the `requestLengthDiskThreshold` attribute of the element. 這個屬性可讓您管理輸入資料流緩衝區的大小。This attribute enables you to manage the size of the input stream buffer. 預設為 256 個位元組。The default is 256 bytes. 您指定的值不應該超過您指定的值`maxRequestLength`屬性。The value that you specify should not exceed the value that you specify for the `maxRequestLength` attribute. ## 將檔案上傳控制項與使用 UpdatePanel 控制項Using the FileUpload Control with the UpdatePanel Control 控制項用來在局部網頁呈現期間使用回傳的案例中，而不是在非同步回傳的案例。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 當您使用內控制控制項，必須使用的控制項上傳檔案面板的物件。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控制項用來更新選取的區域，而不是整個頁面更新與回傳的頁面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191897)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191897). 本節包含下列四個範例：This section contains the following four examples: - 第一個範例示範如何建立控制將檔案儲存至程式碼中指定的路徑。The first example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. - 第二個範例示範如何建立檔案系統中的應用程式會將檔案儲存至指定的目錄的控制項。The second example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified directory in the file system for the application. - 第三個範例示範如何建立控制項，將檔案儲存至指定的路徑，並限制可以上傳之檔案的大小。The third example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified path and limits the size of the file that can be uploaded. - 第四個範例示範如何建立控制項將檔案儲存至指定的路徑，讓只有擁有.doc 或.xls 檔案名稱的擴充功能要上傳的檔案。The fourth example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified path and allows only files that have the .doc or .xls file name extensions to be uploaded. > [!CAUTION] > 這些範例所示的基本語法控制項，但它們不會示範所有必要錯誤檢查，應該要儲存檔案之前完成。These examples demonstrate the basic syntax for the control, but they do not demonstrate all the necessary error checking that should be completed before to saving the file. 如需更完整的範例，請參閱 。For a more complete example, see . 下列範例示範如何建立控制將檔案儲存至程式碼中指定的路徑。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. 呼叫方法，將檔案儲存在伺服器上指定的路徑。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/cs/fileuploadclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/VB/fileuploadclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何建立檔案系統中的應用程式會將檔案儲存至指定的目錄的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified directory in the file system for the application. 屬性用來取得目前執行的伺服器應用程式根目錄的實體檔案系統路徑。The property is used to get the physical file system path of the root directory for the currently executing server application. 呼叫方法，將檔案儲存在伺服器上指定的路徑。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass2/cs/fileuploadclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass2/VB/fileuploadclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何建立控制將檔案儲存至程式碼中指定的路徑。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in the code. 控制項可以上傳為 5 MB 的檔案大小的限制。The control limits the size of the file that can be uploaded to 5 MB. 屬性用來存取基礎屬性和傳回檔案的大小。The property is used to access the underlying property and return the size of the file. 如果要上傳檔案大小不超過 2 MB，呼叫方法，將檔案儲存在伺服器上指定的路徑。If the size of the file to upload is less than 2 MB, the method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. 除了檢查應用程式程式碼中設定的最大檔案大小，您可以設定`maxRequestLength`屬性要在您的應用程式的組態檔中的最大容許大小的項目。In addition to checking for the maximum file size setting in your application code, you can set the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the element to a maximum allowable size in the configuration file for your application. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass3/cs/fileuploadclass3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass3/VB/fileuploadclass3vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何建立控制將檔案儲存至程式碼中指定的路徑。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in the code. 這個範例可讓您僅擁有.doc 或.xls 檔案名稱的擴充功能要上傳的檔案。This example allows only files that have the .doc or .xls file name extensions to be uploaded. 方法呼叫以傳回要上傳檔案的副檔名。The method is called to return the extension of the file to upload. 如果檔案有.doc 或.xls 檔案的副檔名，呼叫方法，將檔案儲存在伺服器上指定的路徑。If the file has a .doc or .xls file name extension, the method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass4/cs/fileuploadclass4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass4/VB/fileuploadclass4vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 控制項不會自動儲存檔案到伺服器之後，使用者選取要上傳檔案。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您也必須明確地提供控制項或機制，讓使用者送出指定的檔案。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，您可以提供使用者按一下 上傳檔案的按鈕。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化的新執行個體類別。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the class. 請注意，這個範例示範如何建構函式語法，但並未新增功能的控制項在建立之後。Note that this example demonstrates the constructor syntax but does not add functionality to the control after it is created. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadCstr/VB/fileuploadcstrvb.aspx#1)]

param.name: writer
param.span: ，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 將要呈現之 控制項的 HTML 屬性和樣式加入至指定的 物件。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of a control to render to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來插入適當的屬性和樣式以的輸出資料流控制項。The method is primarily used by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control. 方法覆寫方法。The method overrides the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定是否可以選取多個檔案上傳。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether multiple files can be selected for upload.

value.span: 如果可以選取多個檔案，則為 ；否則為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] FileBytes { get; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] FileBytes
Public ReadOnly Property FileBytes As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ FileBytes { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用 控制項指定之檔案中的位元組陣列。

span.span: Gets an array of the bytes in a file that is specified by using a control.

value.span: 陣列，包含指定之檔案的內容。

span.span: A array that contains the contents of the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項不會自動讀取檔案從用戶端。The control does not automatically read the file from the client. 您也必須明確地提供控制項或機制，讓使用者送出指定的檔案。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，您可以提供使用者可以按一下 上傳檔案的按鈕。For example, you can provide a button that the user can click to upload the file. 將指定的檔案儲存您撰寫的程式碼無法呼叫屬性，它會傳回檔案的內容。The code that you write to save the specified file could call the property, which returns the contents of the file. 然後再呼叫屬性，您應該使用屬性可讓您確認控制項包含要上傳的檔案。Before calling the property, you should use the property to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫屬性。If the returns `true`, call the property. 如果它傳回`false`，顯示一則訊息給使用者，表示控制項不包含檔案。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 如果您未提供錯誤處理程式碼，請確認檔案存在，嘗試儲存不存在的檔案會擲回例外狀況。If you do not provide error-handling code to verify that a file exists, an attempt to save a nonexistent file throws an exception. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 當使用者按一下**上傳檔案**按鈕時，檔案的內容會顯示為頁面上的文字方塊中的位元組。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. 這個範例會使用上傳整個檔案的屬性。This example uses the property to upload the entire file. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadFileBytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadFileBytes/CS/FileUploadFileBytesCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadFileBytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadFileBytes/VB/FileUploadFileBytesVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The entire file was not read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得用戶端上要使用 控制項上傳之檔案的名稱。Gets the name of a file on a client to upload using the control. 檔案名稱屬性會傳回不包含在用戶端上檔案的路徑。The file name that the property returns does not include the path of the file on the client. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制將檔案儲存至程式碼中指定的路徑。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. 屬性用來取得要上傳檔案的名稱。The property is used to get the name of the file to upload. 呼叫方法，將檔案儲存在伺服器上指定的路徑，使用相同的名稱已在用戶端上的檔案。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server, using the same name the file has on the client. 請注意此範例會示範這個控制項的基本語法，但不會示範應該儲存檔案之前完成的所有必要的錯誤檢查。Note that this example demonstrates the basic syntax for this control, but does not demonstrate all the necessary error checking that should be done before saving the file. 如需更完整的範例，請參閱 。For a more complete example, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得值，指出是否控制項包含要上傳的檔案。The property gets a value indicating whether the control contains a file to upload. 確認要上傳的檔案存在，檔案上執行作業之前，使用這個屬性。Use this property to verify that a file to upload exists before performing operations on the file. 例如，呼叫之前方法，以將檔案儲存到磁碟，請使用屬性，確認檔案是否存在。For example, before calling the method to save the file to disk, use the property to verify that the file exists. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫方法。If returns `true`, call the method. 如果它傳回`false`，顯示一則訊息給使用者，表示控制項不包含檔案。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立執行錯誤檢查的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that performs error checking. 儲存檔案前,呼叫方法來驗證控制項包含要上傳的檔案。Before saving the file, the method is called to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 此外，呼叫方法來檢查是否有相同名稱的檔案已經出現在路徑中。In addition, the method is called to check whether a file with the same name already occurs in the path. 若是如此，要上傳檔案的名稱會加上底線字元前方法呼叫。If it does, the name of the file to upload is prefixed with an underscore character before the method is called. 這可避免覆寫現有的檔案。This prevents the existing file from being overwritten. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/cs/fileupload.saveascs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/VB/fileupload.saveasvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得基礎物件使用上傳的檔案控制項。The property gets the underlying object for a file that is uploaded by using the control. 使用這個屬性來存取已上傳檔案的其他屬性。Use this property to access additional properties on the uploaded file. 您可以使用屬性來取得檔案長度。You can use the property to get the length of the file. 您可以使用屬性來取得 MIME 內容類型的檔案。You can use the property to get the MIME content type of the file. 此外，您可以使用屬性來存取屬性，屬性，而方法。In addition, you can use the property to access the property, the property, and the method. 不過，相同的功能由提供屬性，屬性，而方法。However, the same functionality is provided by the property, the property, and the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 當使用者按一下**上傳檔案**按鈕時，檔案的內容會顯示為頁面上的文字方塊中的位元組。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. 這個範例會使用屬性來存取屬性。This example uses the property to access the property. 屬性用來先將檔案內容複製到位元組陣列，決定檔案的長度。The property is used to determine the length of the file before copying the file contents to a byte array. MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveAs (string filename);
.method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename) cil managed
Public Sub SaveAs (filename As String)
public: void SaveAs(System::String ^ filename);

param.name: filename
param.span: 字串，指定伺服器上要儲存上載的檔案之位置的完整路徑。

span.span: A string that specifies the full path of the location of the server on which to save the uploaded file.

summary.span: 將上載之檔案的內容儲存至 Web 伺服器上指定的路徑。

span.span: Saves the contents of an uploaded file to a specified path on the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將上載之檔案的內容儲存到指定的路徑 Web 伺服器上。The method saves the contents of an uploaded file to a specified path on the Web server. 控制項不會自動儲存檔案到伺服器之後，使用者選取要上傳檔案。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您也必須明確地提供控制項或機制，讓使用者送出指定的檔案。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，您可以提供使用者按一下 上傳檔案的按鈕。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. 將指定的檔案儲存您撰寫的程式碼應該呼叫方法，在伺服器，將檔案的內容儲存至指定的路徑。The code that you write to save the specified file should call the method, which saves the contents of a file to a specified path on the server. 一般而言，引發回傳至伺服器的事件的事件處理方法中呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called in an event-handling method for an event that raises a post back to the server. 比方說，如果您提供的按鈕送出檔案時，要將檔案儲存到伺服器的程式碼再可以加入 click 事件的事件處理方法。For example, if you provide a button to submit a file, the code to save the file to the server could then be included inside the event-handling method for the click event. 當您呼叫方法，您必須在要儲存上載的檔案伺服器上指定目錄的完整路徑。When you call the method, you must specify the full path of the directory on the server in which to save the uploaded file. 如果您不在您的應用程式程式碼中明確指定路徑使用者嘗試上傳的檔案時，會擲回例外狀況。If you do not explicitly specify a path in your application code, an exception is thrown when a user attempts to upload a file. 此行為可協助保護伺服器上的檔案的安全，方法不允許使用者指定用來儲存它們上傳的檔案路徑。This behavior helps keep the files on the server secure, by not allowing users to specify a path in which to save the files that they upload. 然後再呼叫方法，您應該使用屬性可讓您確認控制項包含要上傳的檔案。Before calling the method, you should use the property to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫方法。If the returns `true`, call the method. 如果它傳回`false`，顯示一則訊息給使用者，表示控制項不包含檔案。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 如果您未提供錯誤處理程式碼，請確認檔案存在，嘗試儲存不存在的檔案會擲回例外狀況。If you do not provide error-handling code to verify that a file exists, an attempt to save a nonexistent file throws an exception. 若要呼叫的運作，ASP.NET 應用程式必須在伺服器上具有寫入存取權的目錄。For a call to the to work, the ASP.NET application must have write access to the directory on the server. 有兩種方式，應用程式可以取得寫入權限。There are two ways that the application can get write access. 您可以明確授與寫入存取權的應用程式執行上, 傳的檔案會儲存在目錄中的帳戶。You can explicitly grant write access to the account under which the application is running, in the directory in which the uploaded files will be saved. 或者，您可以增加的被授與 ASP.NET 應用程式的信任層級。Alternatively, you can increase the level of trust that is granted to the ASP.NET application. 若要取得應用程式的執行目錄的寫入權限，必須授與應用程式信任層級設定為物件值。To get write access to the executing directory for the application, the application must be granted the object with the trust level set to the value. 增加的信任層級會增加伺服器上的資源的應用程式的存取。Increasing the level of trust increases the application's access to resources on the server. 請注意這不是安全的作法，因為惡意使用者取得您的應用程式的控制項，也可以在這個較高的信任層級下執行。Note that this is not a secure approach, because a malicious user who gains control of your application will also be able to run under this higher level of trust. 它是使用者的具有所需的應用程式執行的最小權限內容中執行 ASP.NET 應用程式的最佳作法。It is a best practice to run an ASP.NET application in the context of a user who has the minimum privileges that are required for the application to run. 如需在 ASP.NET 應用程式安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)和[ASP.NET 信任層級和原則檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information about security in ASP.NET applications, see [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad) and [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立執行錯誤檢查的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that performs error checking. 儲存檔案之前，呼叫方法來驗證要上傳的檔案是否存在。Before the file is saved, the method is called to verify that a file to upload exists. 此外，呼叫方法來檢查是否已有相同名稱的檔案存在於路徑中。In addition, the method is called to check whether a file that has the same name already exists in the path. 若是如此，要上傳檔案的名稱會加上前面的數字方法呼叫。If it does, the name of the file to upload is prefixed with a number before the method is called. 這可避免覆寫現有的檔案。This prevents the existing file from being overwritten. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/cs/fileupload.saveascs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/VB/fileupload.saveasvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: is not a full path.
